overview: Jane (Wilde) is looking for some help to get into her dream school so she turns to an old friend, Tommy (Pistol). He initially turns her down and the reason is because it would be too painful considering it was her and his stepdaughter's (Elena Koshka) and she is no longer around. He changes his mind however after talking to his wife (Penny Barber) and going through some of Elena's old stuff.
title: One Last Kiss
